I can see why people want Portal 3 so much. It's hard to talk about what makes this game so good without spoilers, so just go play it for yourself. If you haven't played the original Portal, go play that first, and come back. It's not a very long game, so go play it, then go play this one.

I remember playing this game when I was young and I never solved anything, I just ran around shooting portals for hours- and I still found joy out of that. Now that I'm older I decided to finish the game and now I have a different kind of joy for it. This game is one of the best I've played and I recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good time!
One of the best games I have ever played. This game is a MUST for any gamer!
Good game. Harder than it's prequel, yet fun. Looking for a challenge even bigger than Portal? Try it's sequel.

If you love Portal One, this game does everything great Portal One did and adds co-op which is amazing. Puzzles are intricate and well thought out throughout both modes story and co-op. 10/10 would recommend.
het is een leuk spel met puzzels

This is the second time I've played the game through, and It was just as fun as the first.  The storyline is well-made and engaging, there are enough simplistic easter eggs to keep the background from being dull, and the Portal community constantly creates new, challenging tests to complete!  This game was worth every cent I paid, and I would definitely recommend this game to everyone.
I love the amount of humor and replayablility. If you finish the story there are the ever hilarious Cave Jhonson videos but there is also a whole level editor so you never, ever run out of tests!
good game. good replayability. 10/10 would reccomend
awesome game loved it for its story and puzzle based gameplay
This game took the base of an already fun game,which was Portal,and it takes ii to a WHOLE other level. The puzzles,the story,the voice acting. Wow...what an amazing experience this game was.
